name: Ratomic
description:
A rat lab with elemental powers is being tested by a hardworking & depressed computer unit.

All the challenges are randomly generated means you won't see  the same situation twice.

Meet Computa a very hardworking employee with dreams of his own.

The lab can feel quite lonely some day, but thankfully this thing just spawned :

The tests are certainly not easy, but they have been validated as "doable" by all our systems with only a 20% chance of dying.

Ok I'll admit there might be something shady about the lab, and I can't exactly tell you that you'll be able to uncover the truth at the end, but at least you can try ?
